title: EP 155: THE PURITANICAL MILLENNIALS! IDENTITY CRISES! ZIM OR ZHER?
description: This episode I get deep on some conversations I had with some great minds about these wacky times we live in. We are in the upside down you know....the Puritanical Millennials! Are they ruining everything? A bi possibly zim/zher man/woman writes in to ask how to get his entire life? A 30 year-old recently unemployed woman wants to have a baby now!!! Should she? A woman with a BPD mom wonders if she can handle boundaries vs. no contact. This episode can't get any deeper - that's entertainment! Get your life and try it out.
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
